translations.You were mentioned on \"{file}\", in a c: 一個已刪除的帳號在「{file}」的留言中提及您。
translations.Files app plugin to add comments to file: 用於對檔案加入留言的檔案應用程式插入式元件
translations.@ for mentions, : for emoji, / for smart: @ 表示提及，: 表示表情符號，/ 表示智慧型選取
translations.Failed to mark comments as read: 無法將留言標記為已讀
translations.An error occurred while trying to edit t: 嘗試編輯留言時發生錯誤
translations.An error occurred while trying to delete: 嘗試刪除留言時發生錯誤
translations.An error occurred while trying to create: 嘗試建立留言時發生錯誤
